definition: Qinghai Lake (Tibetan: mtsho-sngon)
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
green/blue/black/youth/young (of people)
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Hai
lake/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]

sentences.english: Qinghai Lake is the largest inland saltwater lake in China.
sentences.chinese: 青海湖是中國最大的內陸鹹水湖。

sentences.english: Qinghai Lake is the biggest salt lake in China.
sentences.chinese: 青海湖是中國最大的一個鹽湖。

sentences.english: Temperature is one of main factors influencing grasshopper outbreak in the region around Qinghai Lake.
sentences.chinese: 在青海湖地區，氣溫是影響草地蝗蟲發生的主要因素。

sentences.english: The distribution characteristics of tritium in natural water in the area of Qinghai Lake is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道了青海湖地區天然水中氚的分佈及其變化。

sentences.english: The large lake to the south of the mountains is Lake Qinghai
sentences.chinese: 其羣山的南部有個大湖泊，叫做青海湖。

sentences.english: Bird Island is in the northwest section of Qinghai Lake.
sentences.chinese: 鳥島位於青海湖的西北部。

sentences.english: Buha river is one of the main water resource of Qingai lake, drainage area is 135.
sentences.chinese: 布哈河是青海湖的主要的水源之一，流域面積135。

sentences.english: We should continue to pay attention to the development of Qinghai Lake.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該繼續關注青海湖的發展。

sentences.english: Qinghai Lake is China's largest lagoonal.
sentences.chinese: 青海湖是中國最大的鹹水湖。

sentences.english: Bird Island in Qinghai Lake on the hundreds of thousands of migratory birds.
sentences.chinese: 青海湖鳥島上有數以十萬計的候鳥。

sentences.english: In the cold winter, the lake will be covered with a thick layer of snow.
sentences.chinese: 而在寒冷的冬季，青海湖會披上一層厚厚的銀裝。

sentences.english: Do you know Qinghai Lake, the largest salt water lake of China, is going dry?
sentences.chinese: 你知道中國最大的鹹水湖青海湖正瀕臨乾枯嗎？

sentences.english: Qinghai the largest inland body of salt water in China, lies3198meters above sealevel .
sentences.chinese: 青海湖是中國最大的內陸鹹水湖，海拔3198米。

sentences.english: The Qinghai Lake is the largest saltwater lake in China.
sentences.chinese: 青海湖是中國最大的鹹水湖。

sentences.english: In Qinghai Lake, the most famous Bird Island.
sentences.chinese: 在青海湖，最著名的是鳥島。

sentences.english: Qinghai i lake, the beautiful and rich is rich in taste and high nutrition put the fish.
sentences.chinese: 青海湖的美麗和豐富是豐富的味道和高營養把魚。
